alert.note: Alert for Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Medina County through 645 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chippewa Lake, or near Medina, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Medina, Wadsworth, Rittman, Chippewa Lake, Seville, Westfield Center, Gloria Glens Park, Chippewa-On-The-Lake and Briarwood Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
